item.title: Alex Gibney’s Jigsaw Names Robert Kessel Exec VP of Scripted Content (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Robert Kessel has joined Alex Gibney’s Jigsaw Productions as executive vice president of scripted content. Kessel will be responsible for expanding Jigsaw’s film and TV scripted projects. He will also
